entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Clearing late in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 except southeast 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
